title: Student Pulsar Search Program Expands Nationwide Thanks to NSF Grant to WVU and NRAO (Associated ...
text: ( Source : Associated Universities Inc ) West Virginia University ( WVU ) and the National Radio Astronomy Observatory ( NRAO ) together received a nearly $2 million, three-year grant from the National Science Foundation ( NSF ) to expand the reach
